item.title: 从Pandas到PySpark
item.description: PySpark的特性 Immutable Changes create new object references Old versions are unchanged Lazy Compute does not happen until output is requested Pandas VS PySpark Load CSV # Pandas df = pd.read_csv("datafile.csv") # PySpark df = spark.read.options(header=True, inferSchema=True).csv("datafile.csv") View Dataframe # Pandas df # PySpark df.show() Columns & Data Types # Pandas df.columns df.dtypes # PySpark df.columns df.dtypes Rename Columns # Pandas df.columns
